markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Deep Gnome Rockwarden](/Monsters.aspx?ID=96)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Deep gnome rockwardens follow druidic teachings and commune with the natural elemental influences and denizens of the Darklands. They know that not everything that lives below ground is sinister and evil, but they also understand that all primal spirits and entities must be respected.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/DeepGnome_DeepGnomeRockwarden.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Deep Gnome Rockwarden](/Monsters.aspx?ID=96)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 75</row>

**Perception** +14; darkvision

**Languages**
[Gnomish](/Languages.aspx?ID=5), [Terran](/Languages.aspx?ID=22), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +9, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +11, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +14, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +2

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Hide Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7), primal focus, [Sling](/Weapons.aspx?ID=72) (10 bullets), scroll of [_nondetection](/Spells.aspx?ID=209)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +12 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +14 

</row>

**HP** 63

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 15 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
pick +10 ([fatal d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=178)),
**Damage** 1d6 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
sling +11 ([Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 50 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 1d6 bludgeoning

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 21
- **1st**
[Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159)

**Primal Prepared Spells** DC 24, attack +14
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Acid Splash](/Spells.aspx?ID=3), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246)
- **1st**
[Ant Haul](/Spells.aspx?ID=13), [Shocking Grasp](/Spells.aspx?ID=283), [Ventriloquism](/Spells.aspx?ID=356)
- **2nd**
[Acid Arrow](/Spells.aspx?ID=2), [Deafness](/Spells.aspx?ID=62), [Spider Climb](/Spells.aspx?ID=299)
- **3rd**
[Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Meld into Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=188)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-27" />
name: Deep Gnome Rockwarden
